{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS GT-AC2900.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = ROG Rapture AC2900 Dual-Band WiFi Gaming Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/us/Gaming-Networking/ROG-Rapture-GT-AC2900 |sp = https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/GT-AC2900/HelpDesk/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_GT-AC2900 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = GT-AC2900 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (ROG Rapture) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC2900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTACHN00 |icid = 3568A-RTAC86U |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4906;BCM4906KFEBG, TK1620, P55W-01 N2AW; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107:P; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.1 (Gen 1), USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = yes,, 10-pad header,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, acqam, DFS (master), AiMesh, VHT160, VHT80+80, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_XX_2G,ASUS_XX_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = AsusWRT-Merlin
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/15/2019 |estreldate = 01/07/2019 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 2167 |nqam1 = 750 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 750 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com {{see also|ASUS RT-AC2900|ASUS RT-AC86U|Arcadyan}}
This device received FCC certification via Class II Permissive Change Letter dated 3/15/2019 for MSQ-RTACHN00 of the [[ASUS RT-AC86U]]. Some changes to the design are noted.
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/GT-AC2900/HelpDesk_Download/ Downloads]
===News=== *[https://rog.asus.com/articles/networking/up-your-game-with-the-rog-rapture-gt-ac2900-gaming-router/ ''Up your game with the ROG Rapture GT-AC2900 gaming router'' at '''ASUS ROG'''] *[https://edgeup.asus.com/2019/asus-ces-2019-new-products/ ''See all the new ASUS and ROG gear from CES 2019'' on '''ASUS EdgeUP''']
===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-rog-rapture-gt-ac2900-review ''ASUS ROG Rapture GT-AC2900 review'' on '''Digital Citizen''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/rog-rapture-gt-ac2900.54492/ ''ROG Rapture GT-AC2900'' on '''SNB''' forums]
==See also== :[[List of MU-MIMO supported devices]] *[[ASUS GT-AX11000]] - ''ROG Rapture AX11000 WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AX6000]] - ''ROG Rapture AX6000 WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] - ''ROG Rapture Aura 10G Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC5400]] - ''ROG Rapture Dual Band WiFi Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC5300]] - ''ROG Rapture Tri-Band Gaming Router'' *ASUS GT-AC2900 - ''ROG Rapture Dual-Band WiFi Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AC2900]] - ''AC2900 Dual-Band Gigabit Wi-Fi Router'' *[[ASUS ROG Areion 10G]] - ''10GbE PCI-Express LAN Card''
